original: Nahetuṁ parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
analyzed: na hetum parittam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na parittaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sabbattha tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na mahaggataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum appamāṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na appamāṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
